name: Paze Knight Ellen and the Dungeon town Sodom
name_original: Paze Knight Ellen and the Dungeon town Sodom
description:
■■A "Female Knight RPG" featuring a knight who keeps getting herself into naughty situations■■
Blonde, dignified, and strong.
Don't you wanna just corner her and humiliate her?

Paze Kingdom Knight Ellen was heading towards a dungeon town called "Sodom".
There were reports of "Goblins" attacking the residents there.
Ellen was there to scout out the place.
Lilia, a wizard in training, tagged along with her.
"I can see the town, it's over that hill"
Ellen and Lilia whipped the horse and raced towards the hill.

■■Characters■■
[Ellen]
(CV 柚木つばめ)
A female knight from the Paze Kingdom Knights. Also known as the Paze Ritter.
She was a dignified knight who fought hard to help those in need. She was a symbol of "Power" and "Justice".
But her luck ran out as soon as she got here... She was forced to strip naked and ended up becoming a prostitute.
But she kept at it. She kept on fighting against the odds...
[Lilia]
(CV 小日向らむね)
Wizard in training. Lilia adored Ellen like an older sister.
She was always trying to help Ellen with "Intel".
She was innocent and didn't have a body like Ellen's but she ended up just like her...
She was the perfect "Bait".
Ellen was extremely strong, but once the enemy took Lilia hostage, there wasn't much she could do.
Lilia was Ellen's biggest weakness.

■■Basic gameplay■■
[Butt-naked by default]
Sodom, a town covered in walls. Residents aren't allowed to wear clothes to prevent anyone from smuggling out goods.
Adventurers and Knights were allowed to wear gear on their upper body, and the rule applied to Kingdom Knights as well.
Ellen tried to fight it but she had no choice in order to proceed with her mission.
She was uncomfortable at first, but she was starting to get used to this.
[Regular short RPG]
Ellen was more than strong enough to clear out the dungeon by herself.
But since she wasn't fully geared, she was always at risk of being assaulted by other adventurers, monsters, and allies.
Solo-battle for the most part, but the party can grow up to 4 when Lilia and Sodom soldiers join in.
[Story revolves around the main town]
Use the "Town" as base camp when exploring the dungeon.
In town you can find facilities like shops, hotels, brothels, slums, public bath, recollection room, and more.
Basic game cycle:
Go into the dungeon, get treasure, improve gear, go back into the dungeon and take out the boss, and report to the master.
■■Adult system■■
[Adult event]
Regular event adult scene. Some adult scenes and pictures are animated.
Most events can be evaded if you choose to. You can stay a virgin until you beat the game.
You can watch past events from the recollection room in town.
You can recreate the event or simply watch the CG. Once you beat the game, it will all be unlocked.
[3 types of naughty combat]
(1) Typical naughty combat where you get attacked my monsters. You should also watch out for other adventurers. Ellen and Lilia are both vulnerable.
(2) The men in your party will assault you two if their TP increases to a certain level.
(3) During brothel dungeon events, Ellen works as a prostitute and takes out enemies using "Sex moves".
■■Game concept■■
-Love for brave blonde submissive female knights
-Love for elegant pink hair
-Love for bikini armor and naughty armor
-Get raped by delinquents for no reason
-Short RPG with combat
-Beat the game a virgin
-Get raped/rape during combat
-Get raped by members of your party
-Look at all kinds of naughty status
■■Event situation samples■■
-Strip naked
-Raped in public
-Raped after losing to a dungeon boss (combat can be skipped)
-Nice hotel owner, room that can't be locked, public shower
-Lilia staying home alone is in danger...
-Bathing with men
-Paying off soldiers with your body
-A delinquent joins your party and bonds with you at the hotel
-Collecting cum to become a prostitute
-Can't disobey, they took Lilia hostage...
-Help the young villagers become men
...And more... Lots of gang-bang scenes...
■■Game features■■
-Beat the game as a virgin: Possible (Ellen and Lilia both)
-Recollection event: 30~
-Time to beat the game: 4, 5 hours
-Difficulty: Easy and Normal
■■Safe design
-4, 5 hours to beat.
-If there's a naughty scene after losing to a boss, you can choose to lose the fight. You can also use self-destruct items.
-All recollection scenes will be unlocked once you beat the game.
Hints available in easy mode.
-You can turn the voice ON/OFF, and SHOW/HIDE male characters.
-Symbol Encounter
